stories.Title: SREday in London
stories.Description: SRE enthusiasts, this one's for you! Prepare for SREday in London on September 14-15, featuring an extraordinary lineup of over 50 talks. Act fast! Early bird tickets are still available.
stories.Tweet: SREday in London 📦 SRE enthusiasts, this one's for you! Prepare for SREday in London on September 14-15, featuring an extraordinary lineup of over 50 talks. Act fast! Early bird tickets are still available. #SRE https://sreday.com/?unpack

stories.Title: India is on the moon!
stories.Description: A historic moment unfolds before us, as Chandrayaan-3 gracefully lands near the moon's southern pole, making India the fourth country to achieve this remarkable feat.
stories.Tweet: India is on the moon! 📦 A historic moment unfolds before us, as Chandrayaan-3 gracefully lands near the moon's southern pole, making India the fourth country to achieve this remarkable feat. #india https://www.space.com/india-chandrayaan-3-moon-landing-success

stories.Title: An ironic setback
stories.Description: ESA's efforts to clear Earth's orbit encounter an unexpected obstacle as the Vespa payload adapter, intended for removal, faces potential damage from an unexpected debris impact.
stories.Tweet: An ironic setback 📦 ESA's efforts to clear Earth's orbit encounter an unexpected obstacle as the Vespa payload adapter, intended for removal, faces potential damage from an unexpected debris impact. #ESA https://spacenews.com/target-of-european-debris-removal-mission-hit-by-other-debris/

stories.Title: Fine-tuning meets GPT
stories.Description: OpenAI has enabled custom data integration for GPT-3.5 Turbo, allowing users to enhance model performance for specific tasks, leading to more reliable and personalized responses.
stories.Tweet: Fine-tuning meets GPT 📦 OpenAI has enabled custom data integration for GPT-3.5 Turbo, allowing users to enhance model performance for specific tasks, leading to more reliable and personalized responses. #openai https://techcrunch.com/2023/08/22/openai-brings-fine-tuning-to-gpt-3-5-turbo/

stories.Title: Empowering communication with AI
stories.Description: ElevenLabs exits beta with an innovative text-to-speech model that seamlessly covers over 30 languages, offering the choice of natural-sounding speech and even the ability to clone your own voice.
stories.Tweet: Empowering communication with AI 📦 ElevenLabs exits beta with an innovative text-to-speech model that seamlessly covers over 30 languages, offering the choice of natural-sounding speech and even the ability to clone your own voice. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/ai-startup-elevenlabs-launches-text-to-speech-model-supporting-30-languages/

stories.Title: MS Paint gets an AI boost
stories.Description: Microsoft Paint could soon feature AI-powered tools in Windows 11. Reports suggest AI-generated canvases based on text prompts are in the works.
stories.Tweet: MS Paint gets an AI boost 📦 Microsoft Paint could soon feature AI-powered tools in Windows 11. Reports suggest AI-generated canvases based on text prompts are in the works. #microsoft https://www.theverge.com/2023/8/22/23841824/microsoft-paint-ai-features-windows-11

stories.Title: Apptronik presents Apollo
stories.Description: This futuristic humanoid robot emerged after years of development and research. With its versatile capabilities and strategic design, Apollo is ready to tackle heavy-duty environments.
stories.Tweet: Apptronik presents Apollo 📦 This futuristic humanoid robot emerged after years of development and research. With its versatile capabilities and strategic design, Apollo is ready to tackle heavy-duty environments. #robotics https://www.therobotreport.com/apptronik-unveils-apollo-humanoid-robot/

stories.Title: 16 years in the making
stories.Description: A newly revealed patent, dating back to 2007, sheds light on Vision Pro's technology origins. It is clear that Apple's long-term planning and dedication have paid off.
stories.Tweet: 16 years in the making 📦 A newly revealed patent, dating back to 2007, sheds light on Vision Pro's technology origins. It is clear that Apple's long-term planning and dedication have paid off. #apple https://9to5mac.com/2023/08/23/working-on-vision-pro-since-2007/

stories.Title: Cybertruck’s latest sighting
stories.Description: Watch how Tesla's enigmatic electric pickup arrives at the company's test track in Fremont. As we get closer to production, could this be the final version?
stories.Tweet: Cybertruck’s latest sighting 📦 Watch how Tesla's enigmatic electric pickup arrives at the company's test track in Fremont. As we get closer to production, could this be the final version? #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/08/23/tesla-cybertrucks-final-version-test-track/

stories.Title: Introducing: Kombai
stories.Description: Designed to assist front-end developers, this model understands and codes UI designs like a human. With design files from Figma, Kombai generates React and HTML + CSS code in a single click.
stories.Tweet: Introducing: Kombai 📦 Designed to assist front-end developers, this model understands and codes UI designs like a human. With design files from Figma, Kombai generates React and HTML + CSS code in a single click. #programming https://www.producthunt.com/posts/kombai-research-preview

stories.Title: Nothing gets an upgrade
stories.Description: Nothing OS 2.0 is coming to Nothing Phone 1 users next week. Your device is about to get better with monochrome icons, app enhancements, and more.
stories.Tweet: Nothing gets an upgrade 📦 Nothing OS 2.0 is coming to Nothing Phone 1 users next week. Your device is about to get better with monochrome icons, app enhancements, and more. #nothing https://www.androidauthority.com/nothing-phone-1-nothing-os-2-launch-date-3357286/

title: India successfully lands, GPT-3.5 Turbo gets fine-tuning, Apptronik unveils Apollo
description: Hooray! India has finally reached the moon’s southern pole. An exciting end to an exciting race. For a country to accomplish such a significant feat is fantastic. OpenAI now allows you to enhance GPT-3.5 Turbo with custom data to get tailor-made responses. And meet Apollo, a friendly-looking robot that helps you with boring tasks... like moving boxes.
